name: Bensen
headline: Online and phone ordering for restaurant takeout and delivery
markdown:
raw_markdown="×
#### A message from the Texthood team
In this time of crisis where we all feel like nothing is in our control, one of the most important things any business owner can do is to maintain a direct relationship with their customers even though they can't dine in right now.
When the crisis ends, and it will end one day, the customers who remember your brand's name and the quality it stands for will be the first ones to walk back in through your doors.
Our online and text ordering services help you take orders from your customers directly under your brand and under your control. We're by your side during this crisis and we'll help lay the groundwork for the recovery.
The Texthood Team Dismiss
×
#### Texthood Newsletter Signup
###  Sign up for our newsletter and stay connected! 
Email:
Get tips on how to maximize the effectiveness of texting, first looks at new features, additional promotions, and more! 
[ ![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/Texthood-Logo-Small.png) the texthood ](http://www.bensen.ai/</#page-top>)
  * [](http://www.bensen.ai/</#page-top>)
  * [overview](http://www.bensen.ai/</#page-top>)
  * [features](http://www.bensen.ai/</features/#page-top>)
  * [blog](http://www.bensen.ai/</blog/#page-top>)
  * [about](http://www.bensen.ai/</about/>)
  * [ request a demo ](http://www.bensen.ai/</#demo>)
  * [ log in ](http://www.bensen.ai/<https:/thetexthood.com/client/>)


# welcome to the texthood
### Order online and by text without crazy commissions
![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/menu-front-small.png)
### Order online and by text without crazy commissions
  * Existing ordering apps leave you with a lot of work but no profit
  * We'll embed online ordering into your website so customers can order directly from you
  * Up to 10x less expensive than using third party apps


![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/best_of_boston_logo-2.png)
Vinh, co-owner of [Le's Vietnamese](http://www.bensen.ai/<http:/lesvietnamese.com>) says: 
3rd party online ordering apps are killing local restaurants with their commissions. 
The Texthood helps us convert app customers to direct customers by letting them order online and by text on their phones. 
### Request a demo
Submit
### All your customers are texting
### Isn't it time you joined the conversation?
![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/menu-reorder-small.png)
### All your customers are texting
### Isn't it time you joined the conversation?
  * Enable your existing business number to receive customers' texts
  * We automate responses so you don't have to respond manually
  * Replace your phone orders with text to save time and hassle


![](https://images.getbento.com/accounts/255a35865c78fc9d3f0639a99947244e/media/accounts/media/PwedMJROSNuuzyiVVJLt_logo-yellow-transparent.png)
Chris, owner of [The Bucket](http://www.bensen.ai/<https:/www.thebucketwv.com>) says: 
Texthood is a great match between user simplicity and the restaurant's needs! Many customers have said “Wow, way to change the game Bucket”!. 
The ease of just texting and not having to download an app has been extremely beneficial to all customers both young and old! Texthood gets 5 out of 5!” 
### Simple to use
![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/customized_menu.png)
### Grow your brand and control your message
  * Engage directly with your customers without a third party getting in the way
  * Online ordering menu and text experience are customized to fit your brand and message
  * You can even text your customers directly to clarify the order or just to say thanks


![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/best_of_boston.png)
Alex, co-owner of [Coreanos](http://www.bensen.ai/<http:/coreanosallston.com>) says: 
The Texthood has been a great addition. Its ease of use helps stream-line operations especially during busy hours. 
The number of orders continues to grow with some customers ordering multiple times a week. 
###  Request a demo 
Join our network and take control of your online and mobile ordering. 
Name
Mobile number
Email
Keep me informed about updates, features, and tips for growing my business. 
Submit
No app required for customers. 
To receive orders, restaurants may use: 
![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/Texthood-Logo-Small.png)Online App 
[ ![Get it on Google Play](https://play.google.com/intl/en_us/badges/images/generic/en_badge_web_generic.png) ](http://www.bensen.ai/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thetexthood.restaurant>)
[![](https://thetexthoodcom.s3.amazonaws.com/img/ios.svg)](http://www.bensen.ai/<https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-texthood/id1127026316?mt=8>)
#### Contact
Email: | info@thetexthood.com  
---|---  
Text:| [(617) 553-6048](http://www.bensen.ai/<sms:+16175536048>)  
Please note: we are unable to modify, cancel, or refund orders. If you are a diner requiring help with an order, please contact the restaurant directly.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Bensen**

Bensen is a Boston-based startup that was born out of necessity in the food delivery and takeout sector. Operating under the name "Texthood," the company provides online and text ordering solutions for restaurants, allowing them to streamline the takeout and delivery process without relying on costly third-party apps. Founded as part of the Y Combinator Batch W19, Bensen is on a mission to help restaurants maintain direct relationships with their customers, especially during challenging times when in-person dining isn't an option.

**What They Do**

Bensen's innovative platform lets restaurant owners embed an order system directly into their own websites. This gives them full control over customer interactions and significantly cuts down on commission fees—up to ten times less expensive compared to traditional ordering apps. The simplicity of Bensen’s service means that customers can place orders through text messages, eliminating the need for a dedicated app. This approach not only reduces friction for customers, who can simply text their orders, but also frees up time for restaurant staff by automating responses.

**Why It Matters**

Restaurants have faced mounting pressure from commission-heavy delivery services, which have threatened their profitability. Bensen's solutions are geared towards empowering restaurant owners, allowing them to convert app users into direct customers. Quotes from restaurant owners, such as Chris from The Bucket and Alex from Coreanos, highlight the platform’s user-friendliness and how it has streamlined operations, proving beneficial for both staff and clientele.

**The Team**

With a small but dedicated team of two, Bensen operates with an agile philosophy, focusing on delivering high-quality service to its restaurant partners.

**Getting Involved**

If you own a restaurant and want to take back control of your ordering process, Bensen offers demos through their website. They encourage businesses to join their network to leverage the benefits of direct online and text ordering, thus paving the way for a more resilient business model. 

**In Summary**

Bensen is not just another tech startup; it's a lifeline for local restaurants navigating the modern marketplace. By prioritizing direct customer relationships and reducing operating costs, Bensen positions itself as an essential tool for food and beverage businesses in Boston and beyond. If you're in the restaurant industry, it might just be time to rethink how you handle takeout and delivery—and Bensen could be your answer. 

For more information, visit [Bensen's website](http://www.bensen.ai).
